Token.Abstract: A Bit6Group object represents a group formed by several users.
Returns a Bit6Group object based on the Bit6Address indicated.

Parameter.Name: address
Parameter.Abstract: Bit6Address of the group.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a Bit6Group object for the Bit6Address indicated.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Bit6Group object based on the Bit6Conversation indicated.

Parameter.Name: conversation
Parameter.Abstract: Bit6Conversation linked to the group.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a Bit6Group object for the Bit6Conversation indicated.

Token.Abstract: Creates an empty group.
Token.Declaration: + (void)createGroupWithMetadata:(nullable NSDictionary<NSString*,id> *)metadata completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( Bit6Group *_Nullable group , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: metadata
Parameter.Abstract: metadata for the new group. If provided it has to be able to be converted to JSON data (check by using +[NSJSONSerialization isValidJSONObject:])

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Creates an empty public group with the specified identifier.
Token.Declaration: + (void)createPublicGroupWithIdentifier:(nonnull NSString *)identifier metadata:(nullable NSDictionary<NSString*,id> *)metadata completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( Bit6Group *_Nullable group , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: unique identifier to use.

Parameter.Name: metadata
Parameter.Abstract: metadata for the new group. If provided it has to be able to be converted to JSON data (check by using +[NSJSONSerialization isValidJSONObject:])

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Join a public group.
Token.Declaration: + (void)joinGroupWithAddress:(nonnull Bit6Address *)address role:(nonnull NSString *)role completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( Bit6Group *_Nullable group , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: address
Parameter.Abstract: Bit6Address of the group to join.

Parameter.Name: role
Parameter.Abstract: requested role in the group. There are constants available to use: Bit6GroupMemberRoleAdmin and Bit6GroupMemberRoleUser.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Sets the metadata for the sender.

Parameter.Name: metadata
Parameter.Abstract: new metadata for the sender. If provided it has to be able to be converted to JSON data (check by using +[NSJSONSerialization isValidJSONObject:])

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Abandon the sender. Updates related to the sender won't be received anymore.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: The Bit6Address object associated with the sender.
The Bit6Address object associated with the sender.
The Bit6Address object associated with the sender.
The creation timestamp of the sender.
The creation timestamp of the sender.
The creation timestamp of the sender.
The last updated timestamp of the sender.
The last updated timestamp of the sender.
The last updated timestamp of the sender.
The sender subject.
The sender subject.
The sender subject.
The Bit6GroupMember objects in the sender as a NSArray.
The Bit6GroupMember objects in the sender as a NSArray.
The Bit6GroupMember objects in the sender as a NSArray.
YES if the user role in the group is Admin.
YES if the user role in the group is Admin.
YES if the user role in the group is Admin.
YES if the user has left the group.
YES if the user has left the group.
YES if the user has left the group.
YES if the group is public.
YES if the group is public.
YES if the group is public.
Refreshes the members of the sender.
Token.Declaration: - (nullable NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *)loadMembersListWithCompletion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *_Nullable members , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: current members list of the sender.

Token.Abstract: Invite an user to the group.
Token.Declaration: - (void)inviteGroupMemberWithAddress:(nonnull Bit6Address *)address role:(nonnull NSString *)role completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *_Nullable members , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: address
Parameter.Abstract: Bit6Address indicating the user to invite.

Parameter.Name: role
Parameter.Abstract: requested role to assign to the user invited to the group. There are constants available to use: Bit6GroupMemberRoleAdmin and Bit6GroupMemberRoleUser.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Invite users to the group.
Token.Declaration: - (void)inviteGroupMembersWithAddresses:(nonnull NSArray<Bit6Address*> *)addresses roles:(nonnull NSArray<NSString*> *)roles completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *_Nullable members , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: addresses
Parameter.Abstract: array of Bit6Address indicating the users to invite.

Parameter.Name: roles
Parameter.Abstract: array of requested roles to assign to the users invited to the group. There are constants available to use: Bit6GroupMemberRoleAdmin and Bit6GroupMemberRoleUser.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Invite users to the group.
Token.Declaration: - (void)inviteGroupMembersWithAddresses:(nonnull NSArray<Bit6Address*> *)addresses role:(nonnull NSString *)role completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *_Nullable members , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: addresses
Parameter.Abstract: array of Bit6Address indicating the users to invite.

Parameter.Name: role
Parameter.Abstract: role to assign to the users invited to the group. There are constants available to use: Bit6GroupMemberRoleAdmin and Bit6GroupMemberRoleUser.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.

Token.Abstract: Remove a member from the group.
Token.Declaration: - (void)kickGroupMember:(nonnull Bit6GroupMember *)member completion:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSArray<Bit6GroupMember*> *_Nullable members , NSError *_Nullable error ))completion

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Abstract: member to be removed from the group.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: block to be called when the operation is completed.
